author: Angela Woolsey/FFXnow
title: Ten arrested in Fairfax County child predator sting
text:
Ten men whose jobs reportedly range from technology worker to yoga instructor, have been charged with attempting to solicit sex from children after a three-day sting operation by the Fairfax County Police Department.
Police Chief Kevin Davis announced Thursday that 10 men were arrested as a result of “Operation ADC Express 2,” which began on Dec. 18 and involved undercover detectives with the department’s Child Exploitation Unit posing online as 13 or 14-year-old teens.
Noting that several of those arrested have criminal records, Davis said he’s “satisfied” to see that “10 predators are in jail this holiday season.”
“We never know the true impact of taking one of these predators off the street, because ultimately, they offend again, again and again,” Davis said at the press conference. “It’s been my experience that the only way to interrupt the criminal misconduct of these types of predators is to incarcerate them, so that’s exactly what we did.”
According to police, the undercover detectives encountered the suspects in online forums, where the men initiated “sexually related conversations” even though the detectives explicitly presented themselves as underaged.
The men were arrested when they attempted to meet the detectives, who they believed were teens, at an agreed-upon “familiar public place,” Davis said.
Collectively facing 25 felony charges, all of the suspects were in custody at the Fairfax County Adult Detention Center without bond, as of Thursday morning, according to police.
The arrests include:
- Michael Flannery, 33, of Winchester was arrested and charged with Attempted Indecent Liberties and Computer-Solicitation of Child Under 15-Years-Old.
- Casto Ian Unson III, 35, of Vienna was arrested and charged with Attempted Indecent Liberties and Computer-Solicitation of Child Under 15-Years-Old.
- Ravi Vongavolu, 24, of Herndon was arrested and charged with Attempted Indecent Liberties and Computer-Solicitation of Child Under 15-Years-Old.
- Rabiul Islam, 44, of Arlington was arrested and charged with Attempted Indecent Liberties and Computer-Solicitation of Child Under 15-Years-Old and Attempted Production of CSAM.
- Osman Aslan, 30, of Vienna was arrested and charged with Attempted Indecent Liberties and Computer-Solicitation of Child Under 15-Years-Old.
- Estuardo Orozco Orozco, 27, of Falls Church was arrested and charged with Computer-Solicitation of Child Under 15-Years-Old.
- Mohamed Elnefili, 38, of Qatar was arrested and charged with Attempted Indecent Liberties and Computer-Solicitation of Child Under 15-Years-Old. He was currently staying in Springfield at the time of his arrest.
- Roy Hayes, 22 of Herndon was arrested and charged with Attempted Indecent Liberties and Computer-Solicitation of Child Under 15-Years-Old.
- Imran Ahmad, 42, of Ashburn was arrested and charged with Attempted Indecent Liberties and Computer-Solicitation of Child Under 15-Years-Old.
- Bassem Karam, 36, of Herndon was arrested and charged with Attempted Indecent Liberties and Computer-Solicitation of Child Under 15-Years-Old.
Police officials urged parents to have conversations with their children about safely using apps and social media and avoiding inappropriate interactions with strangers online, suggesting the National Center for Missing & Exploited Children as a resource.
According to Davis, one of the FCPD’s goals for 2024 is to conduct more operations similar to this three-day crackdown.
“Our community can expect to see more of this in 2024, because our children deserve it,” he said.

author: Johnnyseaoa Ampedpages Com
title: Kia's Layout Advancement: The Aesthetic Appeals of the Newest Models
text:
Kia Motors has made substantial strides in the last few years, strengthening its setting as a leading vehicle supplier. With a focus on style development, Kia has astounded the hearts and minds of vehicle lovers worldwide. Santa Ana, a dynamic city in The golden state, is no exemption to this trend. As the need for brand-new Kia versions in Santa Ana expands, it deserves delving into the aesthetic appeals that have formed these amazing vehicles. Join us as we check out the evolution of Kia's style and celebrate the latest models offered in the city.
Kia Layout Advancement: History 101
Kia's design advancement doesn't stop with its present schedule of phenomenal cars. The brand has a rich history that showcases its dedication to innovative layout. The earliest Kias were straightforward and useful cars, mirroring the needs and tastes of the moment. Nevertheless, as the automobile industry developed, so did Kia's layouts.
In the early 1990s, Kia went into the American market and opened its initial vehicle dealer in the USA. This marked a significant landmark in the brand name's background as it broadened its visibility internationally. The very first Kia automobiles dispersed in the USA were introduced with four dealerships in Rose city, Oregon. Over the years, Kia has actually progressively developed a reputation for producing trustworthy and cost effective vehicles.
One of Kia's earliest models, the Kia Sephia, debuted in 1992 and continued to be in production up until 2003. The Sephia was a small car that offered functionality and worth for money. While it might not have had the sleek design and progressed functions these days's Kia models, it laid the foundation for the brand's future success.
An additional noteworthy design from Kia's earlier years is the Kia Sportage. Launched in 1993, the Sportage was an SUV that captured adventure-seekers' focus. Its tough style and off-road capacities made it popular amongst exterior enthusiasts. For many years, the Sportage has evolved and gone through numerous redesigns, ending up being a stylish and well-shaped SUV in today's Kia lineup.
As Kia remained to innovate and increase around the world, the brand's styles became a lot more polished and sophisticated. The introduction of the Kia Optima in 2000 marked a transforming point in Kia's layout viewpoint. With its sleek and wind resistant styling, the Optima showcased Kia's capability to develop elegant and visually attractive vehicles.
In the last few years, Kia's design language has gone through a substantial transformation. Its schedule of the latest models mirrors the brand name's dedication to pressing borders. The Kia Stinger, a magnificent sporting activities car, takes spotlight
[page]() with its hostile position and vibrant lines. Made to deliver an exciting performance, the Stinger integrates power with refined luxury. Its smooth silhouette and bold features make it a true head-turner on the streets of Santa Ana.
Another standout in Kia's lineup is the Telluride, a midsize SUV that exhibits self-confidence and presence. With its muscular body and powerful grille, the Telluride makes a vibrant declaration anywhere it goes. Inside, you'll discover a roomy and comfortable cabin that can accommodate approximately 8 travelers, making it excellent for family members journeys around Santa Ana.
Kia's commitment to cutting-edge style appears in the upcoming EV6, their very first specialized electric vehicle. The EV6 showcases Kia's futuristic vision with its sleek and wind resistant form. With an emphasis on sustainability and innovation, the EV6 offers a remarkable array and progressed technology, establishing a brand-new standard for electrical vehicles in Santa Ana and past.
Along with their most recent versions, Kia has additionally welcomed the principle of design-led development. Collaborations with distinguished designers such as Peter Schreyer have led to vibrant and distinctive style components that set Kia besides the competition. The "Tiger Nose" grille, a trademark attribute of Kia cars, has actually ended up being a legendary symbol of the brand name's style identity.
Introducing the All-New Kia Optima: Redefining Beauty
Among Kia's best prepared for releases is the all-new Kia Optima. The Optima exhibits the brand name's commitment to developing captivating styles by flaunting streamlined lines and an aerodynamic profile. With its vibrant front grille and striking fronts lights, this sedan commands interest on the streets of Santa Ana. The Optima is a real declaration of luxury and refinement, ideal for those looking for elegance in Santa Ana.
The Kia Sorento: Checking Out Power and Versatility
The Kia Sorento provides the best mix for Santa Ana homeowners that crave flexibility without jeopardizing on design. This midsize SUV stands tall with its muscle outside and positive position. Its strong front fascia and distinctive LED headlights make a long-term perception, while its spacious indoor gives enough area for guests and freight. Whether browsing city roads or discovering the beautiful paths close by, the Sorento ensures a thrilling driving experience integrated with the functionality you require.
Release Your Soul: The Kia Soul's Unique Identification
In Santa Ana, uniqueness is celebrated, and the Kia Heart perfectly embodies this spirit. With its distinctive boxy style and vivid color choices, the Kia Spirit stands apart on the roads like nothing else. High-mounted taillights and a drifting roofline boost its vibrant and vibrant appearance. The Heart's adaptability and indisputable appeal have actually made it a prominent selection among residents trying to find a car that matches their character.
Locating The Perfect Kia in Santa Ana
A respectable Kia supplier in Santa Ana uses numerous brand-new Kia designs to match every choice. These dealers supply outstanding client service and a detailed inventory of new and previously owned Kia automobiles, ensuring that locating the best vehicle is a satisfying and seamless experience.
Embracing the Future: Kia's Commitment to Development
As Kia continues to evolve and press the borders of automobile layout, Santa Ana citizens can expect to see much more exciting and innovative designs in the future. Whether you are seeking a trendy car, a flexible SUV, or an innovative electrical lorry, Kia has something to suit your needs and choices.
So, if one is in the city and looking for an automobile that integrates style, efficiency, and advancement, look no further than Kia. From the brand new Optima to the vibrant Stinger and the upcoming EV6, Kia's aesthetics remain to mesmerize and inspire.

author: Sydney St. Claire
title: Murder suspect appears in court, victims families remember their loved ones - WTVQ
text:
Murder suspect appears in court, victims families remember their loved ones
BOURBON COUNTY, Ky. (ABC 36 NEWS NOW) – The suspect in a double murder in Bourbon County appeared virtually before a judge in Paris, Wednesday afternoon.
19-year-old Christopher Taulbee is accused of killing his child’s mother, 20-year-old Dixieana Brainard, and her boyfriend 24-year-old Chuck Callaway last Thursday (04/03).
Taulbee entered a not guilty plea.
Dixie’s parents, Daniel and Amanda Brainard, recall the kind of person their daughter was.
“She was very tough. Dixie didn’t back down from nothing,” said Daniel.
Her father saying he has heard many stories, even from people he doesn’t know, about how great a person his daughter was and how many lives she touched.
Her parents say she was protective, of her siblings and her child, which she shared with Taulbee.
“The day she had her baby, we, as every parent, were concerned about their children, they’re concerned about what kind of parent they’re going to be,” said Daniel.
Amanda adding, “She exceeded that.”
Chuck Calloway’s siblings, Tyler, Crystal and Jessica say he moved to Paris from Alabama to start a new life and was a loving father to his two children.
“He was very active in their life,” said Crystal. “He was happy, they were happy, and that’s how it should be.”
All three want to make sure his children, and everyone, remember what kind of person chuck was.
“He was a loving person,” said Tyler. “He wouldn’t ever hurt nobody.”
Crystal said, “He was full of life and very joyful and would make you smile. Even though he got on our nerves sometimes.”
Daniel and Amanda say they will continue to show up for their daughter, no matter what.
“There’s not going to be a day that goes by that we don’t have the pain from our daughter being gone,” said Daniel.
Taulbee, accused of the shooting death of Dixie Brainard and stabbing and beating Chuck Calloway to death will be back in court on April 16.

author: Dara
title: Sheet Pan Omelet
text:
A no-fuss breakfast is so easy with this sheet pan omelet – a quick option that works seamlessly for quick mornings or make-ahead meals. Tailor it to your liking with different mix-ins for a breakfast that hits the spot.
This sheet pan omelet is an easy solution to busy mornings. A healthy breakfast is a great way to start the day, but there are only so many times you can eat a bowl of cereal or a piece of toast. I don't know about you, but I need a little variation to keep morning meals interesting.
The beauty of sheet pan omelets is that they can be made to suit almost any palate. Change up the cheese, leave out the meat, swap in your favorite veggies - the options are endless. Plus, they can they can be made ahead of time and reheated as needed.
For other easy breakfast options, try my
English Breakfast Sandwich or Avocado Toast with Egg & Tomato.
Tips for making this recipe
- Pre-Cook the Broccoli: Sauteing the broccoli first ensures that it is properly cooked and tender.
- Evenly Spread: When you transfer the sautéed broccoli to the
quarter sheet pan, make sure it's spread out evenly. This ensures every square inch gets its fair share of deliciousness.
- Experiment with Mix-ins: Don't be afraid to get creative with additional mix-ins. Diced bell peppers, cherry tomatoes, or even cooked sausage can add extra layers of flavor and texture.
- Test for Doneness: Insert a toothpick or a knife into the center of the omelet. If it comes out clean or with just a few cooked egg bits clinging to it, your sheet pan omelet is ready.
See recipe card below for full ingredients list & recipe directions.
Substitutions
Feel free to switch things up to match your taste or what's in your pantry:
- HAM: Use cooked turkey sausage or bacon in place of the ham. For a vegetarian option, skip the ham or replace it with black beans or your favorite meat substitute.
- CHEESE: Experiment with different cheese varieties – pepper jack, feta, or smoked Gouda are all good options.
- VEGGIES: Swap broccoli for other veggies like onions, bell peppers, spinach, or mushrooms.
KEEP IN TOUCH
and receive recipes straight to your inbox!
Variations
- SOUTHWESTERN: Fill with black beans, corn and tomatoes, and top with a dollop of fresh salsa.
- SPANISH: Fill with sautéed onions and cooked diced potatoes. Brown the potatoes first for extra flavor. This combo nicely mimics a traditional Spanish tortilla.
- GREEK-INSPIRED: Fill with tomatoes, feta cheese and Kalamata olives.
- MUSHROOM LOVERS: Fill with sautéed mushrooms and smoked Gouda cheese. Try a variety of mushrooms, such as crimini and shiitake.
How to make sheet pan omelet
COOK THE BROCCOLI: Pre-cooking the broccoli ensures tender broccoli in your finished omelet. You have a few options for cooking it. In this recipe, I sautéed the broccoli in a little olive oil. If you prefer an oil-free option, blanch the broccoli in boiling, salted water for 1 to 2 minutes or steam the broccoli florets.
PREP THE INGREDIENTS: Chop the ham, whisk the eggs with the milk and grate the Cheddar cheese.
ARRANGE IN SHEET PAN: Lightly coat
a quarter sheet pan with cooking spray. Arrange the broccoli and the chopped ham on the sheet pan, spreading evenly. Pour the egg mixture over the fillings, then sprinkle the grated Cheddar cheese over top.
COOK THE OMELET: Bake the sheet pan omelette until the egg is set, about 15 to 20 minutes. To test for doneness, insert a toothpick into the center of the egg. If it comes out clean, the egg is cooked. Alternatively, give the pan a shake. The egg in the center shouldn’t move once cooked.
What to serve with an omelet
Enjoy your sheet pan omelet as is for a quick, satisfying breakfast, or get creative:
- Breakfast Sandwich: Sandwich a square between an English muffin, along with sliced tomatoes, for a hearty grab-and-go breakfast.
- Side or Fruit Salad: Serve with a
fruit salador strawberry smoothiefor breakfast. If serving as a light lunch or dinner, pair the omelet with a green salad tossed with apple cider vinegar dressing.
For more ideas see
What to Serve with Quiche.
Meal Prep and Make-Ahead
MAKE-AHEAD AND STORAGE: Prepare a batch over the weekend, cut into squares, and refrigerate in an airtight container for a grab-and-go breakfast all week long. It reheats like a champ.
FREEZE: Cool the cooked omelet to room temperature, then wrap the individuals in several layers of plastic wrap. Place in a ziptop freezer bag and freeze for up to 3 months.
REHEAT: Reheat in the oven, toaster oven or microwave for a quick and easy breakfast the next day. The omelet takes 30 seconds to 1 minute to reheat in the microwave on 50% power, depending on the wattage of your microwave. Using a higher heat tends to make the eggs rubbery.
If frozen, allow the omelet to defrost first in the refrigerator before reheating.
Frequently Asked Questions
Yes, you can use frozen broccoli. Thaw and drain frozen broccoli before sautéing to prevent excess moisture.
Whisking the eggs vigorously creates air pockets, resulting in a light and fluffy texture. Use the whisk to “lift” the eggs as you whisk upwards in a circle.
To test for doneness, insert a toothpick into the center of the egg. If it comes out clean, the egg is cooked. Alternatively, give the pan a shake. The egg in the center shouldn’t move once cooked.
Definitely! Just scale up the ingredients accordingly and use a larger sheet pan. Increase the cooking time as necessary to fully cook the omelet.
Other Breakfast Recipes You'll Love
If you make this recipe, please let me know! Leave a star rating ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ and comment underneath the recipe card below. Thank you!
Printable Recipe
Sheet Pan Omelet
[Rate](#commentform)
Ingredients
- 2 teaspoons
olive oil
- 1 ¼ cup small broccoli florets
- ¼ + ⅛ teaspoon
kosher salt
- ¼ + ⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper
- 6 large eggs
- ¼ cup reduced fat (2%) milk
- 4 ounces ham steak (thick piece of ham) cut into ¾-inch pieces
- ½ cup grated sharp Cheddar cheese
Instructions
- Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Set the oven rack in the middle of the oven. Lightly coat a quarter sheet pan with cooking spray.
- Heat the olive oil in a small skillet set over medium heat. Add the broccoli and cook until just tender, 4 to 5 minutes. Season with ⅛ teaspoon salt and ⅛ teaspoon pepper. If the pan dries out while cooking, add 2 to 3 tablespoons of water (1 tablespoon at a time). See note below for oil-free cooking methods.
- In a large bowl, thoroughly whisk the eggs with the milk until light and frothy. Season with ½ teaspoon salt and ½ teaspoon pepper. Whisk to combine.
- Arrange the sautéed broccoli and chopped ham on the prepared sheet pan. Spread evenly. Pour the egg mixture over the fillings. Top with the grated Cheddar cheese.
- Bake the omelet until set, 15 to 20 minutes. To test for doneness, insert a toothpick or a knife into the center of the omelet. If it comes out clean or with just a few cooked egg bits clinging to it, your sheet pan omelet is ready.
- Cut into 6 squares. Serve.
Notes
Nutrition

author: @WABI_TV5
title: Strong winter storm on Saturday
text: Strong winter storm on Saturday BANGOR, Maine (WABI) - A low pressure system continues its trek into the Northeast. After a sunny day Friday, clouds will build into the state ahead of the storm. Snow will cross the New Hampshire/Maine border just after midnight and move north and east. Snow should begin in the Bangor area between 3-6 a.m. The heaviest snow will fall during the daytime hours with snow falling at rate of 1-2″ per hour at times. The highest snowfall amounts will be north and west where an average of 10-15″ is predicted with pockets of 15-20″+. The foothills and the interstate area between Augusta and Bangor is in the 6-10″ range. The coast is in the 3-6″ range. Snow will transition to a mix south and east of the interstate mid to late Saturday afternoon. This will bring up to an inch of sleet for areas along and near the interstate from the Bangor area and south. A quarter inch of ice may accumulate as well with freezing rain. Coastal Downeast will see a changeover to heavy rain and could pick up 2-2.5″ of rain. The system will move out late Saturday night and high pressure will move in. Mostly sunny conditions are expected on Sunday, but the wind will pick up; expect northwest winds to gust to 35 mph. Partly cloudy skies are forecast for Monday and Tuesday with highs near or slightly below normal. TONIGHT: Cloudy. Snow starts after 2 a.m. Lows 11-23°. West wind 5-10 mph SATURDAY: Snow west and north. Snow, mix & rain south. Highs 24-41°. Northeast wind 5-15 mph. SUNDAY: Mostly sunny. Highs in the 30s. Northwest wind 10-20 mph with gusts to 35 mph. MONDAY: Partly cloudy. Highs in the 30s. North-northeast wind 5-15 mph. TUESDAY: Partly cloudy. Highs in the upper 30s to low 40s. Northeast wind 5-15 mph. WEDNESDAY: Cloudy with possible showers. Highs in the mid 30s to low 40s. East wind 5-10 mph. Copyright 2024 WABI. All rights reserved.
